website_summaries.verdict: This premium picnic backpack has a large capacity that's ideal for families and comes complete with every imaginable picnic accessory. Wins first place for its stylish design, well-organized interior, and all-round quality.
pros: Classy strap-and-buckle exterior stands out from the crowd
Fully equipped for a 4-person picnic with quality, dishwasher-safe accessories
Cutlery and bottle opener boast stainless steel and wood construction for superior durability
Features a wine cooler pocket with a smaller compartment for keys, phones, etc
Main compartment is insulated to keep food fresh
cons: Bamboo cutting board could be slightly larger

customer_reviews.title: as it had great reviews - but I was REALLY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this, as it had great reviews - but I was REALLY disappointed! First of all, not even close to being worth $85! It's not that great of quality at all. Second, the blanket does not attach. In fact, it arrived unattached. It has a strap and it literally doesn't fit around the blanket. It's SO poorly made. Also, the blanket itself has a velcro attachment to keep it rolled up, but the blanket is so junky the velcro immediately started tearing the threads on it. Honestly, do yourself a favor and pick something else. It's not durable. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️why🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: So i got the picnic pack with the notion of everything will be eligant wnd something i can use when i go out on picnic dates. Unfortunately, i would never serve anyone a glass of wine in a dollar store plastic cup. Very upset about the GLASSES being PLASTIC. If i could recommend one thing with this product make sure your descriptions ARE ACCURATE..... and for almost 80$ its a rip off i could have bought an authentic wicker all in 1 picnic basket and it would look hella better
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COOL AND USEFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes picnic very easy, comfortable and real pleasure! I've bought outdoor, picnic bags and equipment before and this one is a WINNER!! I really enjoy the convenience, not to mentioned the insulated main compartment where I was able to store goods and keep them cold. I bought this for my self but cant wait to share it with my family!! We had a blast with friends on a picnic at the park and I could not believe how well prepare I was with my PICNIC BACKPACK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: johanna gallego

customer_reviews.title: she loved it! This is truly an amazingly beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my girlfriends birthday, she loved it! This is truly an amazingly beautiful bag. The cutlery, cheeseboard, napkins, everything is quality and beautiful. When we were looking at the wine glasses we noticed that one was broken. Upon contacting the seller, they promptly sent a new one. Wonderful customer service. We are looking forward to using this picnic backpack for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best picnic bag for on the go...
customer_reviews.text: Was contemplating a traditional picnic basket. But super happy I purchased this one...I looks great on men for carrying the picnic goods. Easy and comfortable!! Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as advertised, but decent quality picnic backpack.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is decent quality and came with all of the cutlery/flatware. The plates did not have the design on them that was pictured, and the cutting board is more so a block of wood compared to the carved one in the picture. The cutlery does have the wood handle. Overall it's a nice backpack and I think it makes for a nice gift. I like the backpack design and it appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam McEachran

customer_reviews.title: Great Stocking Stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a newlywed couple for Christmas and wanted to keep it when it arrived, but I will order one for myself. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The transaction was smooth and on time... The bag is nice... but my only concern is not for the seller but the manufacturer of the bag. The material could have been a little sturdier for the price. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Body Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it's of good quality and I believe worth the price it's listed at, I purchased for. A wedding gift and filled it with local goodies.. I did have a problem though. Two of the 4 plastic wine glasses were broken.. I'm assuming from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family picnic. Just what we need. My husband loves the look of the bag. Fashionable and practical 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is amazing.!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is an excellent gift and an amazing option for a Picnic. I used it with my boyfriend at the park and we really enjoy having everything at hand.!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris C. Fernandez Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: Utensils are cheaply made, the blanket started to rip with 2 use.. the backpack is nice but that is about the only redeeming quality of this picnic backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong

customer_reviews.title: High quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I loved how it came with everything already wrapped and ready for use! We had a great time using this item for our picnics. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Matan

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this form my son who lives in California. He and his girlfriend spend a lot of time hiking and this will be a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY MANDIA

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I got it for a gift for my sister and she was instantly in love with it. Im seriously considering getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Great wedding gift for new couples. The quality and style was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Issac Kilgroe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Only downside is 1 of the wine glasses came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Almir

customer_reviews.title: Silent Auction
customer_reviews.text: Got lots of attention and went for above asking. NICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan G.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift and I'm glad I opened it up and checked it out before ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and I'm glad I opened it up and checked it out before wrapping it because one of the plastic wine cups was broken! It is very classy looking ....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: great item for a gift but check before giving gift!
customer_reviews.text: It is a stylish and really well equipped picnic backpack. The straps are study and the contents very stylish and useful. However, beware of giving it before unwrapping the contents. We came to find that as the recipient of the gift unwrapped the items, one of the small plastic wineglasses was broken. I suggest checking before gifting. Although Amazon was willing to replace the entire backpack, I had already given the gift and the recipients left for their hometown.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Poole
